title: Input text and pdf
content:
Is it possible to export a pdf-file from illustrator that allow users to input their own text? Will he need a copy of the font, or can I include it in the file?

My client needs to be able to change a line of text on his own for a series of labels.
author: frode frank

comments.content:
You have to set the labels in Acrobat,  
from “Tools” —\> “Advanced Editing” —\> “Forms” —\> “Text Field Tool.”
